title: YOUR SONG
lyrics:
(I hate you girl I hate you girl
I hate you girl I hate you girl)
It’s my jam, it’s my song
It’s my jam, it’s my song
Nan hayan bam-eul geol-eoga

Chagaun yeongi jaughan

I gil-eul jjoch-a eodinga No



Tongue tied, sum meoj-euldeushan hwangholham

Teong bin goeng-eum gadeughan bang

Geu an-e kkaman ne-onsain No



Ajig nege nan geuliun agmong

Eojjeomyeon naegen dalkomhan dog-yag

Honlanseuleon nae ma-eum gat-eun bam

Dasi kkeullyeowa neon



Salang-eun eobs-eo

Nan neobakk-e anboyeo

Negeneun naega jul su issneun geolagoneun gwaenhan gidaeppun

This is your song

This is your song



Salang-eun eobs-eo

Ne pum-e angigo pa

Sangcheo bad-eun ma-eum gipge neoege tto namdolog

This is your song

This is your song



It’s my jam, it’s my song

It’s my jam, it’s my song



Nal ij-eullago keulleob-eul gass-eo mollae

Party all night long

Geunde geogiseo banbogdwae nae nolae

That’s your favorite song

Neon nae dog-i dwae aju toxic

But something ‘bout you

Dasi dol-aoge doe can’t stop it

Nan neoman boyeo



Taedo mommae no contest

Daleun namja da jalla

Dondo munjega anya

Lode-o gaja I’ll be your stylist



Hit my line I’ll call you right back

Hit Milan I catch a flight back

This your song, turn me on

Yea like that like that



Ajig nege nan geuliun agmong

Eojjeomyeon naegen dalkomhan dog-yag

Honlanseuleon nae ma-eum gat-eun bam

Dasi kkeullyeowa neon



Salang-eun eobs-eo

Nan neobakk-e anboyeo

Negeneun naega jul su issneun geolagoneun gwaenhan gidaeppun

This is your song

This is your song



Salang-eun eobs-eo

Ne pum-e angigo pa

Sangcheo bad-eun ma-eum gipge neoege tto namdolog

This is your song

This is your song



It’s my jam, it’s my song

It’s my jam, it’s my song



Salang-eun eobs-eo

Nan neobakk-e anboyeo

Negeneun naega jul su issneun geolagoneun gwaenhan gidaeppun

This is your song

This is your song



Salang-eun eobs-eo

Ne pum-e angigo pa

Sangcheo bad-eun ma-eum gipge neoege tto namdolog

This is your song

This is your song
